page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE by Lisa.
page.content: I wake up at 7.50 to 8.00 and get dressed.Then I tell my mum what I want for breakfast.I usually have cereal and a cup of tea.I watch "TV AM" till 8.20 and then I have my hair done and then go to school.When I get to school I do my handwriting until we go for assembly. When assembly finishes we carry on with our work.Playtime comes.We stay in and do some work then we work until dinner or do P.E.At noon we go home.I stay at home until it is 1.00 then I walk to school.When I arrive I go in and start work again.The lesson lasts until 2.20.When break comes we carry on our work until hometime comes.I go home have my tea and watch tv.If it is fine I go out to play and then go to bed at 9.00.Then I read a book until 10.30.Then go to sleep.
